PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_TransportEquipmentOTN
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties in this property set are applied to transport equipment that act in optical transport network (OTN) system.

PropertyDef.Name: SingleChannelAveragePower
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the average power of a single channel of the transport equipment.

PropertyDef.Name: ChromaticDispersionTolerance
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the tolerance of the transport equipment chromatic dispersion. The value is defined by picosecond per nanometer (ps/nm).

PropertyDef.Name: SingleChannelPower
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the power range of a single channel of the transport equipment.

PropertyDef.Name: MinimumOpticalSignalToNoiseRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the minimum optical signal to noise ratio of the transport equipment.

PropertyDef.Name: PolarizationModeDispersionTolerance
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the polarization mode dispersion tolerance of the transport equipment. It is usually measured by picosecond.

PropertyDef.Name: SingleWaveTransmissionRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the single wave transmission rate of the transport equipment.

PropertyDef.Name: EquipmentCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the equipment capacity of the appliance. The value is defined in bits/s.
